Posts.Content: ladies and gents, i too want to wish all of you a happy loving thanksgiving. we've all got diferent lives and stories , but in someways its the same story. FIGHT CANCER. i pray that all's well with each of you. i'm tring my best to focus in on jesus, he's my only source. you're all so sweet. i read alot of these posts but sometimes dont join in. i am glad youre here. thank all for being so helpful. give all thanks to god. deedee
Posts.Title: giving thanks

Posts.Content: kathi, i know how you feel having lost my only daughter myself in oct. she was 30 yrs old i lost my baby son 3 yrs before in july . he was 22 yrs. i really give you a big hug and i pray god gives you peace. i know money no matter how much can replace a child or any other loved one for that matter. praying for you ..... dee
Posts.Title: My daughter Stephanie's lawsuit settled...

Posts.Content: sylva im sorry to hear all this god be with you. i also finished my chemo june 30th. and have had pain in my left side right under my rib cage. i had a pet scan in june. it was ok. also had my masc in mar. 2008. what stage were you sylva? i was stage 3 6or8 node pos. i seen my dr the other day he said dont worry. my goodness should i insist on another scan. i really do pray everything is ok with you. big hug deedee
Posts.Title: Results of CTScan

Posts.Content: hi wibby. i had 2 small ones in the left breast but i also had a lump. cancer. when they went in to do the masc. the dr found a 5x5 cm cluster that didnt show up on mamm or ultra sound. anyway stage 3, 8 node pos. her-2 pos. my friend called me a couple wks ago and was worried they did a mamm and found a mass of micros in her breast, did a biop. and everything was fine. its not uncomman they said for woman over 50 to have these. glad youre out of treatment. how long has it been? believe me if you have questions youve come to the right place to ask, these women are pretty smart. also read proverbs 3:5-6
Posts.Title: Microcalcifications?

Posts.Content: my dau killed herself tues nite. i just finished my rad on the fri before that she was waitnig for me to come back to ohio with her. helppppppppp. she needed me and i wasnt there
Posts.Title: plz help

Posts.Content: merry christmas all. i just want to say i feel so bad for every person in these rooms everyone with this fight with cancer. i know i complain alot but my heart is broke for all of us. i go for lads on mon. then in jan im suppose to get another mam. to kournee i pray for you hon. i to have had losses during this time my dau died in oct. on dec 14th she would have been 31. pray kornee plz pray. i know its hard sometimes my mind goes 100 mph my thoughts are negative but we all want to live. god is able . i know theres times when i have to remind myself this. all of you reading this from breast to brain or colon every form of this awful disease young and old i love and pray for you all. gods will be done. john 10:10 and believe me its not easy i know . some are so happy some so sad. help us lord to depend on you . thank you all and have a blest christmas. i know what its like to be lonely i to have no one to talk to .my husband is leaving this week for ohio ill be here alone . my granddau might be here shes 15 , but really wants to go to boyfriends and friends. we havent told her were moving to ohio shes been doing fairly well here in ind but we couldnt find affordable housing here. her mom died in ohio and she begging me not to go back there. im so tore up. so much to think about. i just pray all my tests come back ok . i want to go on with my life. deedee
Posts.Title: feeling bad

Posts.Content: hi. i got a vit. mag. from puritan's pride. they're pretty cheap. i was wondering if anyone has heard of this company. they have a ton of stuff and i seen the other day that some were talking about herbs and vits. just wondering. deedee
Posts.Title: anyone know puritan's pride vits
